commit message: new android sdk and play service

android 6 removes apache http client, we use it , so add legacy support.
https://developer.android.com/preview/behavior-changes.html#behavior-apache-http-client
after release new development version should be increased

added floating navigation button, fix bug with toolbar title
Reference #26
enabled title in toolbar, on expanded mode its hidden

speed up location scanning, by making only a single request update and use generic 'Criteria' so other Location Provider like 'fused' can be used
Reference #34
refactoring: all preference handling is now implemented in class Preference

optimized gastro database loading, after database downloaded from server, a local version and last modification time is stored
on next startup cache version is used, if database is not modified on server
fixes #35

added support for osmand
if no navigation app is installed (no google apps) make suggestion for osmand. Its open source and available on f-droid.
fixes #36
